Bash(cd "C:/Users/doggy/Wealthsimple Operator/wealthsimple-operator/backend" && python -c "
from db import SessionLocal
from models import MeetingNote

session = SessionLocal\(\)
notes = session.query\(MeetingNote\).filter\(MeetingNote.call_transcript != None\).limit\(1\).all\(\)
if notes:
    note = notes[0]
    print\(f'Found note with transcript:'\)
    print\(f'  Title: {note.title}'\)
    print\(f'  Type: {note.meeting_type}'\)
    print\(f'  Has AI Summary: {note.ai_summary is not None}'\)
    print\(f'  AI Provider: {note.ai_provider_used}'\)
    print\(f'  Action Items: {len\(note.ai_action_items or []\)} items'\)
else:
    print\('No notes with transcripts found'\)
session.close\(\)
" 2>&1)
